typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: true) ~> ReadDeleteSustainmentActions
ReadDeleteSustainmentActions select(mapColumn(
		{$id} = Name),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> IdSelection
IdSelection derive({$metadata.$model} = 'dtmi:SustainmentAction;1',
	{$entityDelete} = 'true') ~> ModelDefinition
ModelDefinition sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['tmp_SustainmentActions.v1.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> WriteToTempRepo
source(output(
		Name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: true) ~> ReadTempStatusSustainmentActionsStatusEditor
ReadDeleteSustainmentActions select(mapColumn(
		Name),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> StatusColumnSelectionSustainmentActionsStatusEditor
ReadTempStatusSustainmentActionsStatusEditor, StatusColumnSelectionSustainmentActionsStatusEditor exists(ReadTempStatusSustainmentActionsStatusEditor@Name == StatusColumnSelectionSustainmentActionsStatusEditor@Name,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> StatusUpdateSustainmentActionsStatusEditor
StatusUpdateSustainmentActionsStatusEditor sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['SustainmentActions_status.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> WriteTempStatusStatusUpdateSustainmentActionsStatusEditor
source(output(
		SustainmentAction as string,
		ActionFamily as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: true) ~> ReadTempStatusSustainmentActionsActionFamiliesStatusEditor
ReadDeleteSustainmentActions select(mapColumn(
		Name),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> StatusColumnSelectionSustainmentActionsActionFamiliesStatusEditor
ReadTempStatusSustainmentActionsActionFamiliesStatusEditor, StatusColumnSelectionSustainmentActionsActionFamiliesStatusEditor exists(Name == SustainmentAction,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> StatusUpdateSustainmentActionsActionFamiliesStatusEditor
StatusUpdateSustainmentActionsActionFamiliesStatusEditor sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['SustainmentActionsActionFamilies_status.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> WriteTempStatusStatusUpdateSustainmentActionsActionFamiliesStatusEditor
source(output(
		SustainmentAction as string,
		EquipmentGroup as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: true) ~> ReadTempStatusSustainmentActionsEquipmentGroupsStatusEditor
ReadDeleteSustainmentActions select(mapColumn(
		Name),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> StatusColumnSelectionSustainmentActionsEquipmentGroupsStatusEditor
ReadTempStatusSustainmentActionsEquipmentGroupsStatusEditor, StatusColumnSelectionSustainmentActionsEquipmentGroupsStatusEditor exists(Name == SustainmentAction,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> StatusUpdateSustainmentActionsEquipmentGroupsStatusEditor
StatusUpdateSustainmentActionsEquipmentGroupsStatusEditor sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['SustainmentActionsEquipmentGroups_status.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> WriteTempStatusStatusUpdateSustainmentActionsEquipmentGroupsStatusEditor
